Ref: Modified RFP documents for AE/IE issued by MoRTH vide Letter No H-39011/30/2015-P&P (Part-I) Dated 15.02.2019. As per civil contract provisions for EPC/HAM/BOT , the design is the obligation of the Contractor/ Concessionaires. However the review of the prior to execution is to be carried out by the concerned AE/IE as per contract conditions. 2 _ In order to ensure proper review of design by the expert, the provision for Highway Design Engineer & Bridges/ Structure Design Engineer are hereby provided under RFP documents for AE/IE; Accordingly, the following amendments to RFP documents are hereby issued. 3_ Amendment to RFP Documents for Authority Engineer A Following Sub-Professional Staff is added under Enclosure ~A of RFP [is added before survey Engineer] (Page-98 &99) Sr _ Personnel Man-month in Man-month in No B.Sub Professional Staff Construction Construction Period of 24 Period of 18 months months Highway Design Engineer 3 Bridge Structure Design Engineer 3 4 B. i) Enclosure -B of RFP of AE for Qualification of SUB PROFESSIONAL at Page-113, the qualification and experience of Highway Design Engineer and Bridge/ Structure Design Engineer is added before Survey Engineer as per Annexure A_ ii) The note under sub-professionals of Enclosure -B at Page-114 is amended as under: Note: Upto 2 sub-professional can be a fresh graduate (zero/less than minimum required work experience) with first class in graduation stream. Eligibility requirement in terms of minimum years of experience shall not be applicable for this sub professional .
